entry.tran: 走珠除臭剂;滚珠香体露
entry.def: A roll-on is a deodorant or cosmetic that you apply to your body using a container with a ball which turns round in the neck of the container.

example.tran: 我使用的是无香型走珠除臭剂。

means.word_mean: 1. a dispenser of a liquid cosmetic (such as a deodorant) having a revolving ball as an applicator
2. a woman's foundation garment rolled on to the hips
